posts.post_title: FS: T206 George Mullin (Throwing, horizontal) SGC 60 EPDG
posts.post_content: Tougher common, strong card with a tougher back. PSA population shows a PSA 4 being the highest graded with an EPDG back. $495 delivered, scan available, just send me your email....thanks
